# Usage

<!-- This is generated by scripts/generate-usage.sh. Don't edit this file directly. -->

```console
$ lintnet help
```

## lintnet info

```console
$ lintnet help info
```

## lintnet init

```console
$ lintnet help init
```

## lintnet new

```console
$ lintnet help new
```

## lintnet lint

```console
$ lintnet help lint
```

## lintnet test

```console
$ lintnet help test
```
